translations.translation: Or is the Unseen in their hands, so they can write out what is to happen?
Or do they have knowledge of the unknown which they copy down?
Or do they have any knowledge of the Unseen which they are now writing down?
Do they possess the knowledge of the unseen which confirms the truthfulness of their belief?
Or that they possess the hidden, so they are writing it?
Or that the Unseen is in their hands, so that they can write it down
Or have they (the knowledge of) the unseen, so that they write (it) down?
Or is the Unseen in their keeping, and so they are writing it down?
Or is the Unseen theirs that they can write (thereof)?
Is the unseen within their grasp so that they write it down?
Is with them the unseen, so that they write down?
Do they possess [access to] the Unseen, so that they write it down?
Or that the Unseen is in their hands, so that they can write it down?
Or that the Ghaib (unseen here in this Verse it means Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz) is in their hands, so that they can write it down?
Or, is the Unseen with them, and they are writing it down!
Or do they know the future, and so they write it down?
Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
[68:47] Or do they possess [access to] the Unseen, that is, [access to] the Preserved Tablet which contains [knowledge of] the Unseen, so that they are writing down?, from it what they say.
(Or is the Unseen) the Guarded Tablet (theirs that they can write (thereof)) that with which they argue against you?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ } معناه يَعلمُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they have the knowledge of the unseen, so they are writing it?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ويزعمون أن { عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ } أي: لوح القضاء { فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ } [القلم: 47] منه جميع ما يحكمون به من الإقرار والإنكار
 وبه يستغنون عن تعليمك وإرشادك
 لذلك يكذبونك وينكرون عليك؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ أم عندهم الغيب } أي: اللوح المحفوظ
 أو علم المغيبات
 { فهم يكتبون } منه ما يحكمون به
